```{r func_dates, include = FALSE}
library(lubridate)
library(stringr)


mon <- as_date("2023-10-02")
tues <- mon+days(1)
wed <- mon+days(2)
thur <- mon+days(3)
fri <- mon+days(4)

advdate <- function(day, week) {
  date <- (day + weeks(week))
  dm <- paste0(
          str_pad(day(date), 2, pad = "0"), 
          ".", 
          str_pad(month(date), 2, pad = "0")
        ) # no month names wiht: label = TRUE
  return(dm)  
} 
```
